name: Escaping from hell
description:
You are a trapped soul in hell, you need to escape!

Controls:
A- Move left

D- Move Right

SPACE- Jump

And when you unlock powerups:

Left/right - Dash

SPACE- Double jump

W/S- Fly

Credits:

Music by Maitheas

Soul from Mixamo

Demon
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/ghost-a0f01623a7c1418caaee24fa1c685c5e

Everything else made by me (Ebediam)
